#summary Steps to create a release

= Steps =

  # Edit pavement.py and change VERSION:
{{{
VERSION = '1.4'
}}}
  # Edit docsrc/source/conf.py and change version:
{{{
version = '1.4'
}}}
  # Edit docsrc/source/usage.rst and change the tar file name:
{{{
tar xzf cronwatch-1.4.tar.gz
...
cd cronwatch-1.4
}}}
  # Commit all changes
{{{
svn commit
}}}
  # Create an SVN tag
{{{
svn copy https://cronwatch.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ https://cronwatch.googlecode.com/svn/tags/1.4
}}}
  # Deprecate the old release download
  # Upload and feature the new release tarball
  # Register with pypi
{{{
paver register
}}}
